qas.question: In what era were there many socio-technological trends?
The 21st century is refereed to as what?
What device was used most during the The Information age?
What was a major concern for Western civilization during the 21 century?
In what time were there many socio-technological trends?
What is the 21st century also known as?
What device was used most during 21st century?
What was considered a threat to Western civilization?

context: In the <a0_0><a4_0>Contemporary era<a4_0/><a0_0/>, there were various socio-technological trends. Regarding the 21st century and the late modern world, <a1_0><a5_0>the Information age<a5_0/><a1_0/> and <a2_0><a6_0>computers<a6_0/><a2_0/> were forefront in use, not completely ubiquitous but often present in daily life. The development of Eastern powers was of note, with China and India becoming more powerful. In the Eurasian theater, the European Union and Russian Federation were two forces recently developed. A concern for Western world, if not the whole world, was the late modern form of terrorism and the warfare that has resulted from the contemporary <a3_0><a7_0>terrorist acts<a7_0/><a3_0/>.
